short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple calculator extension for Chrome, with day and night mode setting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just a simple drop-down calculator for the browser window, may or may not prove useful. Switch between day and night mode as you like.
